data.title: Bruce Springsteen Releases New Single “There Goes My Miracle”
data.meta_description: Official lyric video of ”There Goes My Miracle" by Bruce Springsteen Listen to Bruce Springsteen: https://BruceSpringsteen.lnk.to/listenYD Pre-order the new album Letter to You by Bruce & The E Street Band: https://brucespringsteen.lnk.to/LTY-POAE Subscribe to the official Bruce Springsteen YouTube channel: https://BruceSpringsteen.lnk.to/subscribeYD Watch more Bruce Springsteen videos: https://BruceSpringsteen.lnk.to/listenYC/youtube Follow Bruce Springsteen: Facebook: https://BruceSpringsteen.lnk.to/followFI Instagram: https://BruceSpringsteen.lnk.to/followII Twitter: https://BruceSpringsteen.lnk.to/followTI Website: https://BruceSpringsteen.lnk.to/followWI Spotify: https://BruceSpringsteen.lnk.to/followSI Lyrics: There goes my miracle Walking away, walking away There goes my miracle Walking away, walking away #BruceSpringsteen #ThereGoesMyMiracle #WesternSkies #OfficialVideo #ClassicRock
data.text:
Bruce Springsteen has released a new single “There Goes My Miracle” and accompanying lyric video. This is the second single from his new album Western Stars.

Hear the new track below and watch the lyrics for the song scroll by below…

The Boss recently put out his infamous Jazz Fest set from 2006 following Hurricane Katrina.

He also released “Hello Sunshine” from his new LP which you can stream below.
